Row.Text: Requires a Coastal City. Ships trained in this City: +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and can move into Ocean Tiles. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food from Ocean Tiles and all Sea Resources worked by this City. Denmark's replacement for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lighthouse[ENDCOLOR].

Requires a Coastal City. Ships trained in this City: +1 [ICON_MOVES] Movement and can move into Ocean Tiles. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food from Ocean Tiles. +1 [ICON_FOOD] Food and [ICON_PRODUCTION] Production on all Sea Resources. Denmark's replacement for the [COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Lighthouse[ENDCOLOR].
